item.title: Innovation at CES: The Future of AI on Devices
item.description:
Future Wonders: the future is already here

If “future” makes you think of spaceships and sci-fi, we mean it differently here: future as in future-ready, forward-looking, already real.
Welcome to Future Wonders, the vanlog.it blog where we collect technologies, ideas, and stories that feel like tomorrow—but are available today.

Why “Future Wonders”

Because the best technology has a strange effect: it doesn’t feel like “technology.”
It feels like a smoother workflow, a product that removes friction, software that anticipates a need, a service that simplifies. Often it happens quietly: the new thing arrives, it works, and suddenly it becomes normal.
